description:
Jake Gyllenhaal shocked onlookers with his gaunt appearance at the 17th Annual Hollywood Film Awards on Monday night. 杰克·吉伦哈尔周一晚出席第17届好莱坞电影奖颁奖礼，憔悴的面容深深地震惊了观众们。
And while the 20lb weight loss was for his role as a freelance crime reporter who stumbles upon the dangerous underworld of Los Angeles in Nightcrawler, his new look is still alarming. 暴瘦20磅的他是为了新片角色需要。他在新片《夜行者》中扮演一位报道地下犯罪的自由作家，偶然发现了在洛杉矶的危险地下组织。尽管知道是角色需要，但他的新形象仍然让人惊讶不已。

Gyllenhaal’s razor sharp cheekbones now protrude noticeably and the star insists he wanted his character Lou to be ‘literally and figuratively hungry’.吉伦哈尔面颊凹陷、颧骨突出，他强调是为了展现所饰角色卢在“身体和心理上的饥饿感。”
‘I knew that [Lou] was literally and figuratively hungry, [so I got into the] mode where I was always a bit hungry,’ he told Us Weekly. 他告诉 US 周刊：“我知道（卢）身体上和心理上都非常饥饿，所以我也要进入到永远都很饥饿的状态。”
When asked his tips for losing weight, Jake said, ‘I just love this movie. That’s how I did it. There really was no technique.’当被问及减肥的技巧时，杰克回答道：“我只是很爱这部电影，所以我做到了，真的没什么技巧。”
